_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_: Allows interactive selection of a date range by providing two date fields to define 'From' and 'To' values.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ID_: An internal identifier used to create specific IDs for elements within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_HTM: An alternative ID that overrides the default 'id' value in case specific HTML interactions are required.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ID_: Provides a way to customize the ID attributes of component elements in case multiple instances exist on the same page.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_APP: Determines if the datepicker dropdown attaches directly to the HTML body.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_CHA: A function that's called whenever the date selection is changed.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_CLE: Allows you to clear the date selection.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_DIS: Prevents any interaction with the datepicker.
Disables interaction with the start date.
Disables interaction with the end date.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ERR: Displays error messages if there are issues with the date selection.
Collects all error messages related to the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_FIR: Sets which day is considered the start of the week.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_FOR: Determines the format of the date displayed.
Determines the format of the date when it's saved.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_HEL: Provides helpful text or guidance for using the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ICO: Allows for a special icon to be used for certain days.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_INP: Allows additional attributes to be set for the datepicker input.
Allows additional attributes for the start date input.
Allows additional attributes for the end date input.
Applies CSS classes to the datepicker input for styling.
Sets the name attribute of the datepicker input field.
Determines the width of the datepicker input field.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_IS_: Determines if the datepicker is visible or not.
Determines if the datepicker should be rendered.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_KEY: Sets the key name for the start date in the data model.
Sets the key name for the end date in the data model.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_LAB: Defines the label text for the datepicker.
Applies CSS classes to the label for styling.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_LAN: Sets the language used for the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_MOD: Holds a placeholder if the data model doesn't exist.
The current selected date range in the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_OPT: Allows for additional configuration options for the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_PLA: Placeholder text for the "From" datepicker when no date is selected.
Placeholder text for the "Until" datepicker when no date is selected.
Controls where the datepicker dropdown will be positioned relative to the input field.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_POP: Custom styles for the datepicker dropdown.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_REA: Prevents the date from being changed but still allows interaction.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_REQ: Determines if a date selection is mandatory before submitting a form.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_SHO: Sets predefined date ranges for quick selection.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_TYP: Specifies the type of datepicker, like single date or date range.
_PAGE_DATEPICKER_RANGE_BASIC_DESCRIPTION: A simple datepicker range component allowing the user to select a date range with a clear label.
_PAGE_DATEPICKER_RANGE_CUSTOM_FIRST_DAY_: Customizing the First Day of the Week
Utilizing the 'firstDayOfWeek' prop to set the beginning of the week to Thursday (4) in the Datepicker range component.
_PAGE_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DISABLED_VARIANTS: Various Disabled States for Datepicker Range
use of 'disabled', 'disabledFrom', and 'disabledUntil' props, each affecting the availability of selections in the Datepicker range component.
_PAGE_DATEPICKER_RANGE_FORMAT_CUSTOMIZAT: Custom Date Formats in Datepicker Range
use of 'format' and 'formatSave' props for custom display and save formats in the Datepicker range component.
_PAGE_DATEPICKER_RANGE_HELP_TEXT_DESCRIP: Incorporating the 'helpText' prop to provide additional context or instructions for the Datepicker range component.
